text: CU Writer, also known as "Word Chula", is a word processor capable of Thai language processing. First released to the public domain in 1989, the application runs on IBM PC compatible machines with Hercules graphics card. Later versions can run wit VGA, EGA, EDA, and other graphic technology. CU Writer was one of the most popular word processors in Thailand, until Windows gets more adoption and DOS application faded away. ==References== == External Links == * CU Writer 1.41 source code Category:DOS word processors Category:Free software Category:Thai-language computing Category:1989 software
title: CU Writer
